Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Astra Militarum Bike
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
The Astra Militarum Bike in Warhammer 40,000 is a stalwart component of the Imperial Guard's mechanized forces, offering versatility and mobility. Armed with efficient weaponry and featuring a sturdy chassis, it supports rapid deployments and tactical flexibility. Symbolizing pragmatic resolve, the bike embodies the enduring strength of the Imperial Guard against the threats of the 41st millennium. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1 
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
